awards.text: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 13 wins & 5 nominations.

fullplot: When Jack and Sally announce that they're splitting up, this comes as a shock to their best friends Gabe and Judy. Maybe mostly because they also are drifting apart and are now being made aware of it. So while Jack and Sally try to go on and meet new people, the marriage of Gabe and Judy gets more and more strained, and they begin to find themselves being attracted to other people.
plot: When their best friends announce that they're separating, a professor and his wife discover the faults in their marriage.
title: Husbands and Wives

tomatoes.consensus: Husbands and Wives is a blistering, emotionally raw snapshot of two marriages self-destructing.
